DatasetImportJob.description: Initial DatasetImportJob for the created dataset

JobName.description: The name for the dataset import job.
JobName.markdownDescription:
The name for the dataset import job.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9\-_]*  
Update requires: No interruption

DatasetImportJobArn.description: The ARN of the dataset import job
DatasetImportJobArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the dataset import job

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: arn:([a-z\d-]+):personalize:.*:.*:.+  
Update requires: No interruption

DatasetArn.description: The ARN of the dataset that receives the imported data
DatasetArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the dataset that receives the imported data

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: arn:([a-z\d-]+):personalize:.*:.*:.+  
Update requires: No interruption

DataSource.description: The Amazon S3 bucket that contains the training data to import.

DataLocation.description: The path to the Amazon S3 bucket where the data that you want to upload to your dataset is stored.
DataLocation.markdownDescription:
The path to the Amazon S3 bucket where the data that you want to upload to your dataset is stored.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: (s3|http|https)://.+  
Update requires: No interruption

DataSource.markdownDescription:
The Amazon S3 bucket that contains the training data to import.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

RoleArn.description: The ARN of the IAM role that has permissions to read from the Amazon S3 data source.
RoleArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the IAM role that has permissions to read from the Amazon S3 data source.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: arn:([a-z\d-]+):iam::\d{12}:role/?[a-zA-Z_0-9+=,.@\-_/]+  
Update requires: No interruption

DatasetImportJob.markdownDescription:
Initial DatasetImportJob for the created dataset

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
The name for the dataset

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 63  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9\-_]*  
Update requires: Replacement

DatasetType.markdownDescription:
The type of dataset

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: Interactions | Items | Users  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: Replacement

DatasetGroupArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset group to add the dataset to
DatasetGroupArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset group to add the dataset to

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: arn:([a-z\d-]+):personalize:.*:.*:.+  
Update requires: Replacement

SchemaArn.description: The ARN of the schema to associate with the dataset. The schema defines the dataset fields.
SchemaArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the schema to associate with the dataset. The schema defines the dataset fields.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: arn:([a-z\d-]+):personalize:.*:.*:.+  
Update requires: Replacement

DatasetArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the dataset

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: arn:([a-z\d-]+):personalize:.*:.*:.+  
Update requires: No interruption
